name: Audiochan
description: Audiochan is a message board for musicians. Users can upload their audio to receive feedback from others.

name: Dark Mode Images
description: A simple web application that allow people to upload their image, and get it darkened.

name: Travel2change
description: Travel2change is a website that showcases activities that are fun and impactful, offered by local communities. For this project, the goal was to make the process easier for local communities or organizations to post their activities on the website. Instead of using Wordpress, we used Django to build the application, and implemented a membership system for users to view and create activities.
